name: SASSCAPE ROOM
description:
# SASSCAPE ROOM

Are you ready for "sass-cape"?

SASSCAPE ROOM brings you to explore more rooms and interact with items to escape.

Built using HTML and Sass.

## Control

Mouse is the main tool you can use to play this game. There are so many items you can interact, explore, and use in order to explore other rooms, items, and finally, escape.
